refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends a generic MIDI message to the MIDI OUT port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sends a generic MIDI message to the MIDI OUT port.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para:
kstatus -- the type of MIDI message. Can be:
128 (note off)
144 (note on)
160 (polyphonic aftertouch)
176 (control change)
192 (program change)
208 (channel aftertouch)
224 (pitch bend)
0 when no MIDI messages must be sent to the MIDI OUT port
midiout has no output arguments, because it sends a message to the MIDI OUT port implicitly. It works at k-rate. It sends a MIDI message only when kstatus is non-zero.

warning.para: Warning: Normally kstatus should be set to 0. Only when the user intends to send a MIDI message, can it be set to the corresponding message type number.
